The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 August is 270,971 (481.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 August, there were 5,636 new confirmed cases (10.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 August, there were 5,028 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 12% (608 extra cases).
